cells.data:
-- splitAt :: Int -> [a] -> ([a],[a])
on splitAt(n, xs)
    if n > 0 and n < length of xs then
        if class of xs is text then
            Tuple(items 1 thru n of xs as text, items (n + 1) thru -1 of xs as text)
        else
            Tuple(items 1 thru n of xs, items (n + 1) thru -1 of xs)
        end if
    else
        if n < 1 then
            Tuple({}, xs)
        else
            Tuple(xs, {})
        end if
    end if
end splitAt
